practicePage.option1Description: Extend your thumb on your right hand and keep the other fingers closed.
practicePage.option2Description: Extend your thumb and index finger on your right hand, keep the others closed.
practicePage.option3Description: Extend your index, middle, and ring fingers on your right hand, keep the others closed.
practicePage.option4Description: Extend all fingers on your right hand except the thumb.
practicePage.option5Description: Extend all five fingers on your right hand, keeping them close together.
practicePage.zoomInDescription: Make a zoom-in gesture using all five fingers on your right hand. The fingertips should be far apart.
practicePage.zoomOutDescription: Pinch all five fingers together on your right hand. The fingertips should be very close.
practicePage.swipeLeftDescription: Make a swipe left gesture with your left hand, as if waving to the left.
practicePage.swipeRightDescription: Make a swipe right gesture with your left hand, as if waving to the right.
practicePage.laserPointerDescription: Use your right hand's index finger to point at something on the screen.

homePage.subtitle: The future of education, controlled by gestures
homePage.subsubtitle: A new era in online education: control everything completely touch-free, using just your hands!
homePage.func1Description: Switch between slides with a simple left or right hand movement.
homePage.func2Description: Your camera avatar integrates into the presentation in real time.
homePage.func3Description: Highlight yourself on screen when sharing important thoughts.
homePage.func4Description: You decide which gesture triggers which function - fully configurable.
homePage.func5Description: Present in fullscreen or debug with detailed gesture recognition feedback.
homePage.question: Why should you use it?
homePage.benefits: Online classes become not only more visually engaging but also more immersive - supporting teachers in their work and increasing student attention and participation.
